title: No friend + invite sounds in client
body: As title suggests, I no longer receive any sound notification when a friend messages me or when I am invited to a match. ALL other sounds still exist in the client. There is no setting for this that I have turned off.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you sure you dont have the "Enable friend notifications" box unchecked in the client settings?

Are you running the game as Administrator? If not, please do this.

Have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?
Yes it was none of those. I did figure it out and was rather simple. Apparently having a club chat open suppresses those sounds. I assume this is not intended and a bug.
